p: We extracted 3,912 compounded prescriptions in which 1,041 herbs appeared 28,183 times. The herb number fell to 1,029 after herbal name pre-processing. Of the 1,029 herbs, we identified 626 present in prescriptions that included at least one of the 26 SRKs. Of these, 322 appeared more than 10 times; we confined our attention to these ( Fig. 1).
